title: Honey-Garlic Slow Cooker Chicken Thighs Recipe
description: These crock pot chicken thighs are tender and delicious. The sweet and savory sauce is easy to prep with soy sauce, ketchup, garlic, and honey.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Meat and Poultry Chicken Chicken Thigh Recipes Honey-Garlic Slow Cooker Chicken Thighs 4.0 (3,307) 2,651 Reviews 361 Photos These crock pot chicken thighs are easy to prep with pantry staples. Always a hit with adults and kids! Serve with basmati rice or quinoa and steamed or roasted vegetables. Submitted by Myrna Updated on September 24, 2024 Tested by Allrecipes Test Kitchen Tested by Allrecipes Test Kitchen The Allrecipes Test Kitchen staff are a team of culinary pros who make and vet recipes using only equipment you'd find in a home kitchen. Staff credentials vary but include training at the Culinary Institute of America; kitchen stints in fine dining restaurants; and countless hours in the test kitchen itself. Meet the Allrecipes Test Kitchen Save Rate Print Share Add Photo 361 361 361 361 Prep Time: 10 mins Cook Time: 3 hrs Total Time: 3 hrs 10 mins Servings: 4 Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 4 servings 4 skinless, boneless chicken thighs ½ cup soy sauce ½ cup ketchup ⅓ cup honey 3 cloves garlic, minced 1 teaspoon dried basil Directions Gather all ingredients. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Arrange chicken thighs in a single layer in the bottom of a 4-quart slow cooker. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Whisk soy sauce, ketchup, honey, garlic, and basil together in a bowl; pour over chicken thighs. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Cover and cook on Low for 6 hours or High for 3 to 4 hours. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Serve and enjoy! Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Editor's Note: Please note differences in ingredients and cooking time when using the magazine version of this recipe. I Made It Print 11,566 home cooks made it! Your daily values may be higher or lower depending on your calorie needs. ** Nutrient information is not available for all ingredients. Amount is based on available nutrient data. Add Your Photo Photos of Honey-Garlic Slow Cooker Chicken Thighs 01 of 361 Photo by  Dotdash Meredith Food Studios 02 of 361 Photo by  DaringNaan8475 11/14/2024 Great flavors This is a super easy recipe and so delish. I will make this again for sure. I had no honey so I substituted brown sugar and it tasted really good. I ate it with potatoes and veggies on the side. Would highly recommend this recipe. 03 of 361 Photo by  Grace Grillo 11/03/2024 A keeper! Great flavors Worth the effort Family favorite We make this once a week! 04 of 361 Photo by  alicia toloczko 09/18/2024 A keeper! Easy to follow Crowd-pleaser Followed recipe exactly for sauce but added about 6 chicken thighs to the crockpot. The sauce was amazing over rice. Adding this one to the rotation! 05 of 361 Photo by  WobblyFeta5212 06/28/2024 Easy to follow Crowd-pleaser Family favorite Worth the effort Great flavors A keeper! I followed the recipe as it reads but used 6 thighs and seasoned the chicken with garlic powder, onion powder and paprika. It was TASTY!! Extremely tender and paired with white jasmine rice, green beans, and sweet plantains. I almost burned the whole lot of plantains bc I was going to the slow cooker to continuously taste the chicken bc it was soooo good! My Puerto Rican Family loved this Hawaiian tasting dish. I think Next time I’ll add pineapples! Also- cooked on high for 4 hours ❤️ 06 of 361 Photo by  FizzyCrisp6899 05/06/2024 A keeper! I followed the recipe to the letter and i have to say, this is definitely a keeper! 07 of 361 Photo by  Retmtrcp 04/24/2024 Might try again Good flavor. I thickened the sauce with some cornstarch and then ladled it over the thighs and rice. I used bone in chicken thighs and allowed them to cook until the meat fell off the bone. 08 of 361 Photo by  SteadyMash3940 08/29/2023 OMG!!! Used boneless skinless thighs and boneless skinless breasts. Added a rough chopped onion and a splash of Frank's Red Hot Sauce. Homemade mashed potatoes and carrots. Amazing!!! This is a keeper. Sorry, I took the picture after we ate. It originally looked just like the recipe picture. 09 of 361 Photo by  ElyseC19 08/01/2023 Super easy to make and delicious! 10 of 361 Photo by  robbie_taylor 06/11/2023 My family thoroughly enjoyed! I did however use this recipe in the oven instead of the slow cooker. 1 2 3 4 5 Next You’ll Also Love Chicken Cacciatore Pasta 10 Ratings Honey-Garlic Chicken Thighs 57 Ratings Sheet Pan Harissa Chicken Dinner 7 Ratings Honey Garlic Chicken with Rosemary 266 Ratings Garlic Chicken Fragrant Rice On a Budget 50 Ratings Instant Pot® Lemon-Garlic Chicken Thighs with Rice 7 Ratings Easy Slow Cooker Chicken Thighs with Honey 11 Ratings Marcel's Spicy Slow Cooker Chicken Thighs Instant Pot Sweet and Spicy Chicken Thighs 20 Ratings Balsamic Grilled Chicken Thighs 4 Ratings Baked Lemon Butter Chicken Thighs 156 Ratings Instant Pot Pepper Chicken 119 Ratings Garlic Roasted Chicken and Potatoes 551 Ratings Instant Pot Keto Chicken Thighs in Lemon-Garlic Cream Sauce 20 Ratings Easy Garlic Broiled Chicken 2,073 Ratings Keto Lemon-Garlic Chicken Thighs in the Air Fryer 24 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family.
